scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Comprises correspondence and memorabilia regarding the Henry Clay High School centennial, 2004-2005; notes by Ken Alexander on the Henry Clay High School class of 1922, along with correspondence between Alexander and Ellen Allen, 2006-2013; the 2014 Henry Clay High School yearbook, "Cirque du so Clay;" a 1950 graduate announcement card; and a dark blue stadium seat cushion printed with "HCHS" in gold letters and images of the school's mascot, the blue devils. (1 slim document box and 1 wrapped item)
